items.name: Dungeon Crawler React
items.notes: A dungeon crawler using react and vanilla javascript, all floors randomly generated

items.name: Pomodoro Timer
items.notes: A Pomodoro Timer with task list. Drag and drop is utilized to provide one list for brainstorming and one for whatever your currently working on.

items.name: Simon
items.notes: Simon the classic memory game,all vanilla css and javascript

items.name: Twitch Notifications
items.notes: App using Twitch API for notifications.

items.name: Conway's Game of Life
items.notes: Mathematician Conway's Game of Life: Simulates cell life and death over generations.

items.name: D3.js Scatterplot
items.notes: scatterplot using dataset from alpe d'huez on doping in professional cycling

items.name: D3.js Heatmap
items.notes: Heatmap using dataset for global land surface tempurature

items.name: D3.js Force-Directed-Graph
items.notes: Force directed graph using D3.js using dataset for countries that share borders.

items.name: D3.js Meteorite Landings
items.notes: Meteorite landings using D3.js, uses wikipedia api and public shape file using geojson.

items.name: Voting App
items.notes: FullStack voting app using React, D3.js, MongoDB, and Express.Website is hosted by a free server on Heroku please allow a few seconds to spin up.
